Description: Responsibilities: Responsible for executing the tasks assigned by the superiors in order to deliver the service/information needed within the time frame and with best service quality. Supports the line manager in inquiring information, preparing reports, handling information requests, and performing administrative clerical functions such as preparing correspondence.Skills
Skills: High School degree or College Diploma. Administration certification preferable.
5+ years of relevant progressive professional experience in Administration.
Proven ability to establish and maintain relationships with external vendors. Familiarity with HR practices and employee benefits is a plus.
Proficiency in MS Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint). Flexibility to handle multiple tasks and prioritize effectively.
